title: Perc

title: Ascent

title: BC Web Studio
problem: BC Web Studio needed a home for its own services that separated agency partnerships from business consulting while showcasing vetted case studies, service frameworks, and operating principles in one place.
solution: Designed and developed an Eleventy marketing site with JSON-driven case studies, Alpine.js filtering, and dedicated "For Agencies" and "For Businesses" landing pages. Built a Tailwind/PostCSS component system, reusable info cards, and media carousels powered by structured project data so updates stay fast and consistent.

title: FlySTL
problem: Lambert Airport’s public site hadn’t kept pace with traveler expectations: flight status, TSA, parking, and concessions data lived in disconnected systems, navigation was confusing, and the previous theme couldn’t meet the stricter accessibility and multilingual requirements.
solution: Dual agency project with Kestrel and Dovetail.  Led the rebuild on a custom Tailwind/_tw WordPress theme, wiring Kadence + ACF blocks for every layout need and hooking Alpine.js components into multiple APIs. Built flight-status and search blocks that hydrate from the airport data feed, cron-driven TSA wait-time + open-lane widgets that cache JSON locally, and parking availability cards that hit SuperParkingLot in real time. Hardened the navigation with accessible mega menus, header tab panels, Kadence off-canvas controls, ReciteMe + Google Translate helpers, and skip-link/keyboard workflows. Imported legacy shop/dine + art content via WP All Import + ACF, added custom tax queries, Gravity Forms, and FacetWP filters so the airport team could manage everything without editors calling an engineer.
